summary: Replaces the Skyrim main menu music with that of the intro of Witcher 2
descriptionHtml:
I thought the intro music to the Witcher2 was incredible - a powerful vocal, with a real fantasy feel - and wanted it in Skyrim. I use it with Brumbek\'s spinning logo animation, which is cool.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7801 

NOTE ** - to all who downloaded the file I uploaded previously - i\'m sorry about that! 
I zipped up the original wav instead of the converted xwm. I was tired, with a few beers in me. What can I say??

Anyway this is the CORRECT file. 

To install:
1. In your Skyrim/Data folder, make a new folder \"Music.\" 
2. inside music, another new folder \"special.\"
3. Extract the contents of this zip, then cut/paste \'mus_maintheme.xwm\' into the \"special\" folder.
4. Turn speakers up loud and enjoy!

To uninstall:
delete mus_maintheme.xwm

I have no way to test this on anyone else\'s setup - but I can\'t really foresee any problems. If you have a mod that affects menu music in some way you might have some grief - but you\'re on your own there. 

credits:
None to me, the conversion took 5 seconds.
- the band, who can be found at 
http://www.zywiolak.pl/en/
- vikichan as I used MultiXwm to convert
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3159
Bethesda for another righteous game.

Cheers
author: syrinx_cors
